    • getCodeSmellsActiveRules

      public void getCodeSmellsActiveRules​(java.lang.String filename) throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
      Gets the file with the given name and adds the active rules to the list of active rules
      Parameters:
      filename - Name of the file
      Throws:
      java.io.FileNotFoundException - File with the given name not found

    • fillCodeSmellTable

      public javax.swing.JTable fillCodeSmellTable()
      Returns a JTable with the data from the list of ClassDataStructure
      Returns:

    • initProcessToCalculateCodeSmellsStatistics

      public void initProcessToCalculateCodeSmellsStatistics()
      Calculate each of the CodeSmellStatistics and adds it to the list of CodeSmellStatistics

    • calculateCodeSmellStatistics

      public void calculateCodeSmellStatistics​(ClassDataStructure classToDetect, MethodDataStructure methodToDetect, Rule regra, CodeSmellStatistics css)
      Calculates the values of CodeSmellStatistics using the arguments
      Parameters:
      classToDetect - Class being used to calculate the statistics
      methodToDetect - Method being used to calculate the statistics
      regra - Active rule watching out for the code smell
      css - CodeSmellStatistics being calculated

    • classificationBetweenEvaluationAndSpecialist

      private java.lang.String classificationBetweenEvaluationAndSpecialist​(CodeSmellStatistics sts, boolean our, boolean specialist)
      Returns a string with classification of the evaluation on a code smell
      Parameters:
      sts - The CodeSmellStatistics being updated
      our - The user evaluation
      specialist - The specialist evaluation
      Returns:
      A String

    • compareConditionBooleans

      private boolean compareConditionBooleans​(boolean value, boolean valueToCompareWith, LogicalOperator logicalOperator)
      Compares the booleans and returns according with the LogicalOperator in use
      Parameters:
      value - Boolean being compared
      valueToCompareWith - Boolean being compared to
      logicalOperator - AND or OR
      Returns:
      A boolean

    • giveClassMetricValue

      private int giveClassMetricValue​(Condition a, ClassDataStructure classToDetect)
      Returns the metric from the ClassDataStructure that matches the one in the Condition
      Parameters:
      a - being used to evaluate
      classToDetect - Class being evaluated
      Returns:
      The metric that matches the one in the condition a, 0 if none matches

    • giveMethodMetricValue

      private int giveMethodMetricValue​(Condition a, MethodDataStructure methodToDetect)
      Returns the metric from the MethodDataStructure that matches the one in the Condition
      Parameters:
      a - being used to evaluate
      methodToDetect - Method being evaluated
      Returns:
      The metric that matches the one in the condition a, 0 if none matches

    • giveConditionBooleanValue

      private boolean giveConditionBooleanValue​(Condition a, int metric_value)
      Returns a boolean after comparing the threshold and the NumericOperator that matches the one in the Condition
      Parameters:
      a - being used to evaluate
      metric_value - Threshold of the Condition
      Returns:
      A boolean depending on the NumericOperator, true if there's no matches

    • defineGodClassValueFromSpecialistToClass

      private void defineGodClassValueFromSpecialistToClass()
      Gets the code smell evaluation from the classWithSpecialistValues and saves it in the same method in the classDataStructureList

    • defineLongMethodValueFromSpecialistToMethod

      private void defineLongMethodValueFromSpecialistToMethod​(java.util.List<MethodDataStructure> lmds, java.util.List<MethodBoolean> mb)
      Gets the code smell evaluation from the classWithSpecialistValues and saves it in the same method in the classDataStructureList

    • run

      public void run​(java.util.List<ClassDataStructure> classesJasmlNos, java.util.List<ClassBooleanObject> classesJasmlProfs) throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
      Defines all the variables needed for the CodeSmellsCalculator
      Parameters:
      classesJasmlNos - List of ClassDataStructure from the user excel
      classesJasmlProfs - List of ClassBooleanObject from the specialist excel
      Throws:
      java.io.FileNotFoundException - File with the rules not found
